Directions: Answers must be in essay form. Outline form is not acceptable. Labeled diagrams may be used to supplement discussion, but in no case will a diagram alone suffice. It is important that you read each question completely before you begin.

Sexual reproduction requires that half of the chromosomes in a zygote come from one parent and the other half from the second parent.
content.question: Describe the process by which a germ cell’s complement of chromosomes is halved in the formation of gametes.
